meanings.sent1: The company hired temps to help during the busy season.
meanings.sent2: The temps at the office are always friendly and hardworking.
meanings.sent3: The temps joked around during their break, lightening the mood.
meanings.sent4: The temps were like a breath of fresh air in the workplace.
meanings.sent5: The temps quickly adapted to their new roles, impressing everyone.

meanings.sent1: The high temps in summer make it unbearable to be outside for long.
meanings.sent2: Check the temps outside before deciding what to wear.
meanings.sent3: The temps in the room were so cold that everyone shivered.
meanings.sent4: The rising temps signaled the start of spring.
meanings.sent5: The temps in the oven were just right for baking the cake.

meanings.sent1: She found a job through temps while looking for permanent work.
meanings.sent2: Many companies rely on temps to fill short-term positions.
meanings.sent3: The temps enjoyed the flexibility of temporary employment.
meanings.sent4: Temp agencies help match individuals with temporary employment opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The temps appreciated the chance to gain experience through temporary employment.

meanings.sent1: The snow was only a temp fix for the leaky roof.
meanings.sent2: His anger was just a temp reaction to the situation.
meanings.sent3: The temp solution worked for now, but a permanent fix was needed.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was only temp, fading quickly after the news.
meanings.sent5: The temp relief from the heat was short-lived as the sun came out again.
